column4: you can Alt+Ctrl+F1 (then Alt+Ctrl+F7 to return) to get a terminal, login, and sudo apt-get install fluxbox and select that before login
no, buts its a solution to a problem, there maybe other solutions that do not involve a secondary window manager
its alt+ctrl+f1, then alt+ctrl+f7 to return to here, and it gives you a terminal to login and install apps through apt-get
my soultions are usually advanced, maybe someone here has a simpler solution, keep asking every so often in here
